sentences: He currently runs his own sound studio, Studio X Labs.

In film, he won a Leo Award for Best Sound Editing on the short film Mon Amour Mon Parapluie in 2002, and a Leo Award for Best Music Score in a Short Drama for the film The Road That Binds Us in 2005.
In 2013, Paul Ruskay composed the soundtrack for the Kickstarter.com-funded game Strike Suit Zero.
